snippet: Representative Chris Gibson, who says he will not seek re-election to his Hudson Valley district, is serving as something of a motivational speaker for his party and mulling a bid for governor in 2018.
abstract: Republican Rep Chris Gibson, eyeing a 2018 bid for New York governor, announces that he will not seek re-election to his Hudson Valley district.
lead_paragraph: Representative Chris Gibson, who says he will not seek re-election to his Hudson Valley district, is serving as something of a motivational speaker for his party and mulling a bid for governor in 2018.

headline.main: Chris Gibson, an Upstate Republican, Starts Early on a Possible Run for Governor
headline.print_headline: Newly Re-elected, an Upstate Republican Starts an Early Bid for Higher Office
